title: Colton Underwood and Cassie Randolph beam as they leave lunch together
text:
He recently admitted that he had doubts about where their relationship would lead anywhere.

But Colton Underwood and Cassie Randolph looked like two peas in a pod as they left Urth Caffe in West Hollywood on Tuesday.

The pair, who met on season 23 of The Bachelor, both donned comfy outfits for their outing.

Cute: Colton Underwood and Cassie Randolph looked like two peas in a pod as they left Urth Caffe in the West Hollywood neighborhood of Los Angeles on Tuesday

Underwood, 27, wore a grey hoodie with black straight-leg jeans along with a baseball cap turned backwards.

Randolph, 24, kept warm in a slouchy cream-colored cardigan she paired with jeans featuring a flared hem.

Underwood made headlines on Oct. 10 after he admitted in an Instagram comment that he wasn't sure if their relationship would last.

It all happened after a fan commented on one of his Instagram photos: 'I never saw you too [sic] lasting I am just sayin.'

Getting along: The pair, who met on season 23 of the Bachelor, both donned comfy outfits for their outing

Happy: Underwood, 27, wore a grey hoodie with black straight-leg jeans along with a baseball cap turned backwards

That was when the former NFL star replied: 'Same. It’s crazy what happens when you take your time and don’t feel pressure from a show or public.'

When Randolph made the decision to leave the show, Underwood chased her and won her over for another chance.

But instead of getting engaged per the show's tradition, the pair instead made the choice to get to know each other and continue just dating.

Since the show's close, the two have been doing their best to keep things 'normal for a bit.'

Chic: Randolph, 24, kept warm in a slouchy cream-colored cardigan she paired with jeans featuring a flared hem

Honest: Underwood made headlines on Oct. 10 after he admitted in an Instagram comment that he wasn't sure if their relationship would last

'We have nights where we just come back and hang out with my cats and just watch TV and cook dinner. I’m like, "These are my favorite nights. We need to have more of these." It’s what we’re getting back into right now,' Randolph told Us Weekly.

And when it comes to taking steps forward in the relationship, Underwood revealed that they have no set timeline in mind.

'[We] don’t want to rush something that’s going to last forever,' he said to the outlet.

'We want to build such a strong foundation for ourselves to use to sort of launch us for the rest of our lives, and that’s what we’re doing.'
description: He recently admitted that he had doubts about where his relationship with her would lead. But Colton Underwood and Cassie Randolph looked like two peas in a pod as they left Urth Caffe in the
